name: vibe-remote
description: Remote AI development environment with Vibe-Kanban task management and Claude AI integration

scripts.build:clean: tsc --build --clean && pnpm -r --if-present run clean && rm -rf dist build lib *.tsbuildinfo tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.docker:build: pnpm run build && docker build -t jjdenhertog/viberemote .
scripts.docker:build:dev: pnpm run build && docker build --build-arg USER_ID=$(id -u) --build-arg GROUP_ID=$(id -g) -t jjdenhertog/viberemote:dev .
scripts.docker:push: pnpm run build && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t jjdenhertog/viberemote:latest -t jjdenhertog/viberemote:$PACKAGE_VERSION --push .
scripts.docker:push:no-cache: pnpm run build && PACKAGE_VERSION=$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && docker buildx build --no-cache --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t jjdenhertog/viberemote:latest -t jjdenhertog/viberemote:$PACKAGE_VERSION --push .
scripts.release: npm run docker:push && git push && git push --tags

author: Vibe Remote Contributors
